definitions.body: :2Ki 4:38 pot (probably foreign wd. (Egypt. ?), Ar. ziyrun a large water-jar Lane:1276 is perh. loan-wd.; on Gk. deriv. siro/v, si/rinov v. Lewy:Fremdw. 107);—´[[ס]] abs. 2Ki 4:38 +, cstr. Ex 16:3 +; pl. [[סִירׂת]] Ex 38:3, [[סִירוֹת]] 1Ki 7:45 +; sf. [[סִירׂתָיו]] Ex 27:3, [[סִירׂתֵיכֶם]] Ps 58:10; —pot:

definitions.body: household utensil for boiling 2Ki 4:38, 2Ki 4:39, 2Ki 4:40, 2Ki 4:41, 2Ki 4:41 [[הַבָּשָׂר]] ´[[ס]] Ex 16:3 (P), Zec 14:21; [[נׇפוּחַ]] ´[[ס]] Je 1:13 (cf. [[נפח]] in vision), symbol. of Jerus. Ez Eze 11:3, Eze 11:7, Eze 11:11, Eze 24:3, Eze 24:6; fig. also Ps 58:10 (cf. Che); in sim. Mic 3:3, Job 41:23, Ec 7:6.

pots used in sanctuary, Ez Eze 27:3, Eze 38:3 (both P), 1Ki 7:40 (rd.
